name: Horses and Gun
description:
Horses and gun is a game with several horses, but only one dice-shooting gun. You must use your gun to keep the horses moving and make sure they don't fall too far behind, if they do, you lose. 

How to play:

  • When your gun shoots a die at a horse, it will move you that many tiles forward. E.g. shooting a 3 will move the horse 3 tiles forward.
  • When your horse lands on a tile, it will activate a special effect.
  • If any horse dies, you lose the game.
  • Two horses can't be on the same spot, horses will head to the tile behind the free tile if it is taken.
  • Try your best for a high score

Special tiles:

  • +1 +2 +3: Move your horse an additional amount of spaces
  • Up and Down: Move your horse up and down a lane.
  • Skull: You lose instantly if your horse lands on this tile
  • Gun: Your gun reloads instantly if a horse lands on this tile.

Controls:

-Left click to shoot

Pro tips:

  • Higher lanes have better tiles, try and move your horses as high as possible.
  • Avoid having all 3 horses on the same lane. It can cause a traffic jam.
  • Try and time when a horse lands on a reload tile for maximum time-gain.
  • Lower dice rolls are more likely than higher dice rolls, you are not being unlucky.
